rules.name: amsUpdateSuppressionCrashFix
rules.description: Prevent update suppression from causing server crashes, while providing the coordinates and dimensions where the update suppression occurred
extras: Use the following command to control whether it is forcibly enabled when "customBlockUpdateSuppressor" is enabled, with a permission level of 2:

rules.name: antiFireTotem
rules.description: Totem will not be destroyed by flames and magma

rules.name: bambooCollisionBoxDisabled
rules.description: Allow players to pass through bamboo

rules.name: bambooModelNoOffset
rules.description: The block model of bamboo will not generate offset

rules.name: bedRockFlying
rules.description: Flight in creative mode is consistent with the bedrock version

rules.name: bellBlockChunkLoader
rules.description: Load nearby 3x3 chunks for 15 seconds when a bell is triggered, You can use the rules of blockChunkLoaderTimeController and blockChunkLoaderRangeController to control their loading time and range
extras: Due to after 300 ticks without any players in the current dimension on the server, Minecraft will stop entities updates, hoppers in chunks loaded by this rule will cease to function whenever there are no players in the current dimension.
You can enable the blockChunkLoaderKeepWorldTickUpdate or keepWorldTickUpdate rules to solve this issue.

rules.name: betterCraftableBoneBlock
rules.description: Use nine bones to crafted three bone_blocks

rules.name: betterCraftableDispenser
rules.description: Better craftable dispenser

rules.name: betterCraftablePolishedBlackStoneButton
rules.description: Use deepslate to crafted polished_blackstone_button in minecraft

rules.name: blockChunkLoaderKeepWorldTickUpdate
rules.description: After 300 ticks without any players in the current dimension on the server, Minecraft will stop entities updates, This rule will allow the following rules to bypass this restriction when they are loaded

rules.name: blockChunkLoaderRangeController
rules.description: Used to control the loading range of block loader series rules

rules.name: blockChunkLoaderTimeController
rules.description: Used to control the loading time of block loader series rules

rules.name: blowUpEverything
rules.description: Set all blocks BlastResistance to 0

rules.name: blueSkullController
rules.description: Control the probability of wither and emitting blue skull

rules.name: breedableParrots
rules.description: Customize a food to feed the parrots and breed them (You can also feed them with stones if you really want to)

rules.name: cakeBlockDropOnBreak
rules.description: When the cake is destroyed, it can drop cake (the cake will only drop when it is intact)

rules.name: campfireSmokeParticleDisabled
rules.description: Disable campfire smoke particles

rules.name: commandAnvilInteractionDisabled
rules.description: Players cannot open the UI of the Anvil
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandCustomBlockBlastResistance
rules.description: Use commands to customize the explosion resistance of any block (this rule will not take effect when the enhancedWorldEater rule is enabled)
extras: After enabling the rules, use the /customBlockBlastResistance help command to view the usage instructions
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandGetSaveSize
rules.description: Use the "/getSaveSize" command to get the current save size
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandHere
rules.description: Use the "/here" command to send the current dimension, coordinates, and corresponding overworld/nether coordinates of your current location and give oneself a 30s glowing effect
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPacketInternetGroper
rules.description: player can use the "ping" command in the game
extras: After enabling the rules, use the /ping help command to view the usage instructions
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandPlayerChunkLoadController
rules.description: Control chunk loading for players at any gamemodes

rules.name: commandPlayerLeader
rules.description: Designate one or more players as guides, granting them a glowing effect
extras: After enabling the rules, use the /leader help command to view the usage instructions
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandWhere
rules.description: Use the "/where" command to get the specified player's dimension, coordinates, and corresponding Overworld/Nether coordinates and give the target player a 30s glowing effect
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

rules.name: craftableBundle
rules.description: Crafted bundle in minecraft 1.17/1.18/1.19

rules.name: craftableElytra
rules.description: Add elytra recipes in minecraft

rules.name: craftableEnchantedGoldenApples
rules.description: Enchanted Golden Apples can be crafted with 8 Gold Blocks again

rules.name: creativeOneHitKill
rules.description: Allows players in Creative mode to kill entities in one hit, If the player is sneaking, other entities around the target get killed too

rules.name: creativeShulkerBoxDropsDisabled
rules.description: Breaking a shulker box with items in creative mode will not cause drops

rules.name: customBlockUpdateSuppressor
rules.description: Customize a block to be an update suppressor (Not all blocks can be set as update suppressor)

rules.name: customMovableBlock
rules.description: Customize the non-pushable block to make it pushable
extras: You can also set multiple blocks simultaneously by separating them with commas:

rules.name: easyCompost
rules.description: Make every composting successful

rules.name: easyMaxLevelBeacon
rules.description: Activate full-level beacon with just one base block

rules.name: easyMineDragonEgg
rules.description: Makes the dragon egg not teleport, Players can mine dragon eggs to collect them

rules.name: easyWitherSkeletonSkullDrop
rules.description: 100% Wither Skeleton Skull Drop

rules.name: enderDragonNoDestroyBlock
rules.description: Make the Ender Dragon unable to destroy any blocks

rules.name: enderPearlSoundEffect
rules.description: A sound effect will be played when the player uses an ender pearl for teleportation

rules.name: endermanPickUpDisabled
rules.description: Preventing Endermen from picking up blocks

rules.name: endermanTeleportRandomlyDisabled
rules.description: Random teleportation by Enderman is prohibited

rules.name: enhancedWorldEater
rules.description: Make way for the WorldEater by customizing the explosion resistance of the blocks listed below (this rule will override the commandCustomBlockBlastResistance rule when enabled)
extras: Blocks with blast resistance < 17.0F, Bedrock, Anvil, End Portal Frame, End Portal, End Gateway

rules.name: extinguishedCampfire
rules.description: The campfire is extinguished when the player places it

rules.name: fakePeace
rules.description: Simulation fake Peace

rules.name: fakePlayerNoScoreboardCounter
rules.description: The scoreboard will hide the fake player

rules.name: fakePlayerPickUpController
rules.description: Two modes are provided to control whether fake player can pick up items
extras: [MainHandOnly] - Only the main hand can pick up items
[NoPickUp] - Unable to pick up items at all

rules.name: fancyFakePlayerName
rules.description: Add green prefixes and suffixes to the fake player summoned by the carpet mod, the prefix doesn't need to be input when using the command, but the suffix is indeed present

rules.name: fasterMovement
rules.description: Five gears are provided to allow players to move faster
extras: You can use fasterMovementController rule to control in which dimensions this rule is effective. By default, it is effective in all dimensions.

rules.name: fasterMovementController
rules.description: Used to control in which dimensions fasterMovement rule is effective.

rules.name: flippinCactusSoundEffect
rules.description: When the flippinCactus rule is enabled in the Carpet Mod, using the cactus will produce sound effects (providing five different sound options, Setting it to 0 disables the sound effects)

rules.name: hopperSuctionDisabled
rules.description: The hopper will not suck in items

rules.name: immuneShulkerBullet
rules.description: Players are now completely immune to bullets fired by shulkers

rules.name: infiniteDurability
rules.description: Use items without losing durability

rules.name: infiniteTrades
rules.description: Prevents villager trades from locking up

rules.name: invulnerable
rules.description: Players will be protected from all damage except Void Damage

rules.name: itemAntiExplosion
rules.description: Dropped items will not be destroyed by explosions

rules.name: keepWorldTickUpdate
rules.description: After 300 ticks without any players in the current dimension on the server, Minecraft will stop entities updates, This rule will bypass this restriction

rules.name: kirinArm
rules.description: Allowing players to instantly mine all mineable blocks

rules.name: largeEnderChest
rules.description: Doubles the size of your EnderChest

rules.name: largeShulkerBox
rules.description: Doubles the size of your ShulkerBox
extras: To use this rule, please follow the steps below:
1 - To ensure that no shulker boxes are loaded
2 - Enter the command: /carpet setDefault largeShulkerBox true, to turn on the rule
4 - Disabling the rule follows the same process

rules.name: maxClientInteractionReachDistance
rules.description: Change the maximum interaction distance allowed by the client, set to "-1" to disable this rule
extras: Need to disable the tweakBlockReachOverride feature in Tweakeroo

rules.name: maxPlayerInteractionDistance
rules.description: Change the maximum interaction distance allowed by the server, set to "-1" to disable this rule

rules.name: mitePearl
rules.description: Using an Ender Pearl each time will spawn an Endermite

rules.name: netherWaterPlacement
rules.description: Players can use water buckets to place water in nether

rules.name: noCakeEating
rules.description: Players are not allowed to consume cake

rules.name: noEnchantedGoldenAppleEating
rules.description: Prevent players from accidentally eating Enchanted Golden Apples

rules.name: noFamilyPlanning
rules.description: Allow players to continuously feed animals to breed them

rules.name: noteBlockChunkLoader
rules.description: Load nearby 3x3 chunks for 15 seconds when a note block is triggered, You can use the rules of blockChunkLoaderTimeController and blockChunkLoaderRangeController to control their loading time and range
extras: [bone_block] - When bone_block is on the note_block
[wither_skeleton_skull] - When wither_skeleton_skull is on the note_block, either placed on the note block or hanging on the wall

Due to after 300 ticks without any players in the current dimension on the server, Minecraft will stop entities updates, hoppers in chunks loaded by this rule will cease to function whenever there are no players in the current dimension.
You can enable the blockChunkLoaderKeepWorldTickUpdate or keepWorldTickUpdate rules to solve this issue.

rules.name: optimizedDragonRespawn
rules.description: Optimize dragon respawning

rules.name: pistonBlockChunkLoader
rules.description: Load nearby 3x3 chunks for 15 seconds when a piston is triggered (Centered on the piston head), You can use the rules of blockChunkLoaderTimeController and blockChunkLoaderRangeController to control their loading time and range
extras: [bone_block] - When bone_block is on the piston
[bedrock] - When bedrock is under the piston
[all] - When bone_block is on the piston or bedrock is under the piston

Due to after 300 ticks without any players in the current dimension on the server, Minecraft will stop entities updates, hoppers in chunks loaded by this rule will cease to function whenever there are no players in the current dimension.
You can enable the blockChunkLoaderKeepWorldTickUpdate or keepWorldTickUpdate rules to solve this issue.

rules.name: playerNoNetherPortalTeleport
rules.description: Players cannot teleport through nether portals

rules.name: preventAdministratorCheat
rules.description: Disable some command to prevent accidentally cheating

rules.name: redstoneComponentSound
rules.description: When players right-click on the redstone component, it will emit a sound

rules.name: regeneratingDragonEgg
rules.description: Every time a player defeats the Ender Dragon, a dragon egg will be generated

rules.name: safeFlight
rules.description: players don't get hurt by flying into walls

rules.name: scheduledRandomTickAllPlants
rules.description: Make all plants accepts scheduled tick as random tick

rules.name: scheduledRandomTickBamboo
rules.description: Make bamboo accepts scheduled tick as random tick

rules.name: scheduledRandomTickCactus
rules.description: Make cactus accepts scheduled tick as random tick

rules.name: scheduledRandomTickChorusFlower
rules.description: Make chorus flower accepts scheduled tick as random tick

rules.name: scheduledRandomTickStem
rules.description: Make stems accepts scheduled tick as random tick

rules.name: scheduledRandomTickSugarCane
rules.description: Make sugar cane accepts scheduled tick as random tick

rules.name: sensibleEnderman
rules.description: Make Endermen only pick up watermelons and pumpkins

rules.name: sharedVillagerDiscounts
rules.description: Share villagers discount to all players

rules.name: shulkerHitLevitationDisabled
rules.description: When hit by a shulker, the player only takes damage and does not gain the levitation effect

rules.name: sneakToEatCake
rules.description: Players can only eat cake while sneaking

rules.name: sneakToEditSign
rules.description: Players can sneak with empty hands to edit already placed signs by using the interact key
extras: In Minecraft >= 1.20, the behavior is such that players must sneak in order to edit a sign

rules.name: superBow
rules.description: Enabling making super bows with both infinite and mending enchants

rules.name: undyingCoral
rules.description: Prevent coral blocks and coral fans from dying

rules.name: useItemCooldownDisabled
rules.description: Remove cooldown time for using items

rules.name: welcomeMessage
rules.description: When players join the server, send them a custom message
